Title: Drop-Zone
Writer: Andrew Robinson, Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Geoff Johns (character created by: Miss Martian), Tony Daniel (character created by: Miss Martian), Chuck Dixon (character created by: Bane), Doug Moench (character created by: Bane), Graham Nolan (character created by: Bane)
Actors: Jesse McCartney, Danica McKellar, Nolan North, Khary Payton
Plot: Batman sends the team on its first official mission - to observe and report on a Venom Factory. The team chooses its leader.
